website_summaries.verdict: Works well on uneven terrain and will hold several smaller pets comfortably. A good purchase for smaller pets or for owners who would like flexibility in various weather conditions.
pros: Works well for almost all weather conditions
Front shock absorbers provide comfortable ride
Comes with lots of storage space and 2 drink holders
cons: Can be compromised by "escape artist" pets
Zipper and construction fabric have quality control issues

customer_reviews.title: This is the one! #spoiled
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is the best! Aside from all the compliments we get on the cute looks of it, it truly is great! -holders for two Starbucks, keys and phone, ample room, storage below, steers great, sturdy.... my list goes on! Carl loves going out around the neighborhood, and with a rain cover, he can all year! Also assembles easy, and folds up just like a toddler stroller for storage.
customer_reviews.author: lilmama

customer_reviews.title: great product great price
customer_reviews.text: stroller arrived earlier than expected date. the limit says 15lbs, but I was able to carry my 30lb lasa apso, 10lb tux. cat, and a 12lb bichon frise all together= that's 52lbs!!! Im small and I can handle the stroller with ease. the instructions suck, but its no rocket science to put it together. I was able to assemble everything out of the box in 15mins. I was excited to get the stroller, and im beyond happy with my product. the cat loves the stroller so much that he prefers to sleep in the stroller than anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: two dogs one cat

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Not only did the front wheel break on our first outting using it with my 10 pound pomeranian, I had to pay $18 shipping to return it and I never received my refund. If I would buy another stroller, I would find one with 2 front wheels instead of 1. That front wheel post was not strong and bent way too easily. Even though this is seriously cute, I wouldn't recommend purchasing it. Spend a little more and buy a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! RUSTED!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so mad! I just got this yesterday so my fiancé and I decided to take our dog to a festival today. It broke! Not because of me or my dog but because the wheel is rusted! Awful! Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Saraphina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom as a present for her birthday. We have two Yorkies and one of our Yorkies has refused to walk on a leash his whole life. He now is partially blind and has a bad hip. This stroller is perfect for him! The dogs and all of us love this!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISSATISFIED/ NOT SAFE
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was lopsided since the first time I used it. It wasn't from my dog because he only weighs 5 pounds. After using it a couple times the front wheel wouldn't even turn so after that I hardly used it. I tried it one more time and the whole wheel completely broke off. (The wheel does detach) but in my case the metal piece holding the wheel on broke, so in that case there was no fixing it. I do not recommend this pet stroller to anyone! Not safe for your fur babies.. It's light weight and cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: No stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly well constructed! Hope to give my almost 18 year old dog more outings. I retract this initial evaluation. Not even 2 months and the front wheel collapsed. I must have hit a curb but still.
customer_reviews.author: Huskyowner

customer_reviews.title: Love this pup stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My little pup Nola only walks a little bit, and slow but my other one Lily wants to run, so I Nola into this, and me and lily can jog.... When lily gets tired I can fit her in too... Though it's a little tight. But does the job. Nola is 16lbs Md lily is 30lbs. Both French Bulldogs
customer_reviews.author: vandalay671

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this dog stroller. It’s sturdy, made well, and actually roomy enough that my husbands bigger than what should be riding hitched along to ride with my chihuahua. I had it 2 years and front wheels literally snapped off irreparably while I was pushing it. But it was really great, only complaint is the cup holders always spilled my drinks over and aren’t phone carry friendly sized. Shocks prob would help not slosh my tea but that’s a different price category of stroller. I’ll miss this stroller forever but still have a backup stroller for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley M. Wyskiel

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is the perfect solution. Easy to assemble and super cute and ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is exactly what my 13 year old mixed dog needed. He has hip problems and arthritis and can't walk long distances. We recently got a puppy and he enjoys walks, we felt guilty not being able to bring our aging dog. This stroller is the perfect solution. Easy to assemble and super cute and sturdy. He loves his stroller and it accommodates his 26lbs perfectly. I cried seeing how happy he was to go everywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: Hixie Carr

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time and money. This stroller has tipped over backwards three times with my dog in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Fueston

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Just watch the front tires as they tend to fall off
customer_reviews.text: How I adore this... I can't say enough. This is purrfect for my favorite cat to ride in. It's big, wide, roomy. To say that my cat and I adore this doesn't even do it justice. The only problem is that the front wheels keep coming off and I have to keep praying putting them back on, which isn't hard to do. Just aggravating. Still I love it. I even bought same colored material and made a blanket and pillow and bought a leopard colored mouse and tote and velcroed the tote on.
customer_reviews.author: Leila C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dog Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today - 5 days early! Took 10 minutes to assemble! 2 minutes to make my drink and out the door Cosmo and I went! Had the 4 wheel version for 6 years, but what an upgrade this is. So easy to maneuver, perfect height to push, storage space underneath for dog toys, my purse, etc, and it comes with a rain cover - in South Florida you never know when its going to pour! And with such a reasonable price tag - you cant go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was perfect for our needs and our (9 lb) dog loved it. Unfortunately the front wheel broke the 3rd time we used it. I tried to return it but the seller denied the return because it was past 30 days. I agree it was 30 days past the order date but was well within 30 days of the date the stroller was received. I tried to find the manufacturer on line in hopes I could purchase a replacement wheel but was unable to. I'm totally frustrated and feel this product was defective and should certainly not break the third time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stroller was of better quality than what I had expected
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was of better quality than what I had expected! It came two days early on top of that. I just took it out for a spin it maneuvers very well and the wheels don't get caught on things. My dog was a little nervous when I first put her in but after 15 minutes of walking she was laying down taking in the view. She just got fixed so this is perfect for her she can still go on walks without actually walking. I love this stroller it was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: T.Heffalump

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller! The leopard print is adorable, it’s large enough on the inside where my Coco doesn’t feel too confined and soft too (also, she’s 4.2 lbs for reference). Easy assembly, love how it moves due to the 3-wheel structure. Easy to use as a running stroller. Added the pink bow as a fashionable touch. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nicci Morlock

customer_reviews.title: It's extremely easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is so cute. It's extremely easy to set up; when it comes in it's box, it's pretty much all already assembled, you just have to unfold it and put the wheels on it. It opens from the top like how it shows in the picture but also has a zippered door in the back. That's the part I use because once my cat is in it, it's hard to zip from the top. It has a cruddy plastic zipper that I"m scared will break so I don't chance it. Has lots of window screens so your pet can look out all different angles.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Dee

customer_reviews.text: VERY cheaply made! They don't tell you that it can only go on flat smooth surfaces, not up and down stairs, on and on. It showed a picture of two dogs in it, I don't think so unless they are two lbs, each and it tells you on the instruction sheet that you can not put two dogs in it. Had it three days for a 25 lb. disabled dog and the front wheels broke off. DON'T BUY IT!! JUNK!!
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Hill

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are small and smooth, not all terrain. ...
customer_reviews.text: Wheels are small and smooth, not all terrain. I bought the same stroller last year, but the one I was sent is completely different. The frame is bent, the wheel sticks, and they expect you to pay for return shipping. See the comparison photos.
customer_reviews.author: Ragdoll Mama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for our little Morkie!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is AWESOME!!! Easy to assemble, with tons of storage for all of her things we need with us when we go to festivals. The fabric is so cute, the padding on the inside is soft. Two cup holders on top are great and the bottom storage area is sturdy. It's big enough to easily fit another small dog. The wheels move easily, too. Zippers work well. I highly recommend this to anyone who likes taking their pet with them - especially if you have a small pet who would be stepped on or freaks out in large crowds. Our little girl still gets the attention she loves but feels safe in this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: cfcreate

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit dogs comfortable while together
customer_reviews.text: I bought for 2 dogs, 1-12lbs, the other 8 lbs. Did not fit dogs comfortable while together. Was not suitable for me. I gave to my BFF for her little dog who wants to always be carried. She has a bad back and this product helps her by not carrying her 10 lb morkie. She’s enjoying it, as it helps her.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful and both my 16 pound cat and 16 pound ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and assembled it. We have not taken it out yet, but it looks and feels very well made. It is beautiful and both my 16 pound cat and 16 pound dog seem like they are going to like it. I can fit both of them comfortably except they aren’t crazy about each other right now so they likely wouldn’t appreciate it because it would be close/touching proximity if they both got comfortable. I’m very happy with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: hannah neuse

customer_reviews.title: Love this pet stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pet stroller! After seeing so many people use one at the annual FURY. SCURY (fund raiser for a local animal shelter) I had to have one for my 3 toy poodles. The 3 fit in well and it frees me from having to carry them to the park for their walk! Highly recommend. Has a shelf on the bottom for baggies, tissues, etc. cup holder & drawer for cell phone & keys!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Holm

customer_reviews.title: My babies can really get out and about in Oregon weather in winter, YAY
customer_reviews.text: My babies LOVE these. I only got to try it once. As I mainly got these for our icky days and it is just now winter. So, we will be trying them out now. Was pretty easy to put together, seems sturdy enough. Hopefully we will have good luck in this and they will stay sturdy and nothing will fall off, fall apart etc. I know others have mentioned, wheels and bars and things not holding. I'm crossing my fingers they have fixed all that. So excited to really give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Appleblossom27

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it so far - bought it specifically for an event a friend and I were going to with our 2 - 6 lb puppies and wanted them to be contained and safe if necessary. They absolutely loved it and so did we - there is enough mesh openings in different areas that even when closed they could see us all the time. Very easy to maneuver one handed when necessary as well and all their stuff fit easily into the bottom basket. Look forward to using it with my other 2 dogs as well.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: The perfect solution for my senior dog and me!
customer_reviews.text: My little toy poodle had some very senior issues, such as arthritis and a weakening of her hind legs. She loved going out in her stroller. I could take her anywhere and had room to put her disposal bags, an umbrella, or an extra jacket for me... whatever we needed! I would occasionally take her out of her stroller and would allow her to nose around in the grassy areas, potty, or just walk for a little while on her leash. This stroller was a perfect solution for us. I found it to be well-made and accommodating. And the price was certainly attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Wheels Broke After Only 3 Uses
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price. Bought it for my sister to use as a Christmas gift for her daschunds. She used it 3 times; took it to her sons in Georgia to push her dogs in it and the plastic that supports the wheels snapped in half. Such a shame. I have to give this product a 1 Star. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Lenker

customer_reviews.title: Do it up in style, only the best!
customer_reviews.text: I actually got too help me walk, but even not oh my gosh this is a absolutely adorable stroller made well so far and cute and luxurious sor that fur baby in your life. You want too spoil them try this. (Customer April)
customer_reviews.author: April Madison

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the fact that the front does not stay ...
customer_reviews.text: Made very cheaply. Not happy with the fact that the front does not stay up where you put cups etc. is very wobbly when you're supposed to do. It was advertised as an all-terrain stroller and I basically doesn't move over much of anything. We have only kept it because our dog is so old and so frail that we need something at this point for him. We have seen stroller since then at fleamarket's that are better made than what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My indoor cat gets to go outside now!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large indoor cat that likes to try to escape into the great outdoors. Now I can put him in the stroller and take a nice walk around the lake where I live. He likes it so much that he sleeps in it during the day! I wish I would have had this for my little dog; as she got older she couldn't finish our walks and I had to carry her.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: So Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute stroller, but incredibly hard to push. If you go straight it is ok; but the moment you turn the stroller it becomes impossible to go straight. I would try to return but, my husband already trashed the box!!
customer_reviews.author: jamib

customer_reviews.title: 3 wheel Pet Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, turns on the dime and very easy to maneuver in tight places. Comes with a pet pad inside and a rain bonnet, very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Held

customer_reviews.title: My three cats love to ride around the house in this
customer_reviews.text: My three cats love to ride around the house in this. We own two bengals and one savannah, so they're larger cats and all can fit comfortably. The only thing I don't like is there's a gap when it's closed that they were able to get out of. I'd suggest a collar and leash attached inside to avoid them running off. Other than that I really love it. It's really cute and I have received compliments on it wherever we take it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Lockard

customer_reviews.title: Useless item, irresponsible seller.  Don't BUY EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT purchase this item! The zippers broke on the first day. When I contacted the seller to ask for a replacement part, they told me that they would offer me a reduced price for their defective product. I told them I want a working item, not a discount. This is not a useful product. It is a waste of good money. I am a very careful person with a tiny dog. If this product won't last a day for me, it won't last a day for you.
customer_reviews.author: J. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Classic Navy Blue 3 Wheel Pet Stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Didn't go together quite like the instructions showed(missing spring buttons to click into holes attaching the back wheels to the legs that would prevent them from accidentally slipping off)but, it fit tightly and I don't think they will. I put my 2 dogs (about 12 and 13 pounds)in the stroller and they fit great. Zipped them in and went out to lunch and a superbowl event. They were contained,safe and all of us happy. It initially seemed at little ridiculous, but, works out great if you like to travel with you dogs. Seems as well made as the 4 wheeled one I saw at the pet store yesterday for $129.00.
customer_reviews.author: h20color

customer_reviews.title: Now she is on the same level with most of the patients in their wheelchairs or beds and I can take her down the hallways easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller to take one of my dogs to visit at the senior center where I volunteer. Before, on a leash, she would try to avoid the wheelchairs and I would always end up having to carry her. Even though she is only 11 pounds, it was difficult holding her for the entire time that we were visiting. Now she is on the same level with most of the patients in their wheelchairs or beds and I can take her down the hallways easily and safely. The wheels are very smooth riding and easily turn corners. Great little stroller for Ginger. She loves it and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Brugh

customer_reviews.title: This thing rides good on any terrain
customer_reviews.text: This thing rides good on any terrain! Smooth surfaces like in a mall, concrete, damaged asphalt, dirt and sand. I have not tried it in mud. Depending on the surface, it does make the ride a little bumpy for your pet. Be careful if you lift up the back wheels and depend on the front wheels only. It will tip over. It's very light and easy to push, however it tips over easily. Probably because of the 3 wheel construction. I would probably prefer 4 wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have had this stroller for about 2 years now & it is well worth the $$$. I have a Yorkie & a Chi about 10 pounds each. They fit with plenty of room to move around or lay down. At one time I put 4 small dogs in & the stroller held the weight with no problem (about 40 pounds). Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Perry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 21 lb Mini Schnauzer who is 14 years old and was just diagnosed with cancer which started in her paw and makes it very hard for her to walk. She loves going outside and really likes being strolled when she gets too tired to walk. The stroller came in earlier than expected and was very easy to put together. I love the storage it gives you under the stroller and the cup holders on the handle. The stroller came with a rain cover and it also folds for easy storage. It rides smoothly. This is a great investment for your furry friend!
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great for walks
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is perfect. A 5lb and 7lb ride together well in the stroller. I take leashes along on the walks so that they can walk part of the way and ride when they get tired. As soon as we go to the garage, they hop into the back entry of the stroller. The stroller makes a good walking stroller but is probably too lightweight to make a serious jogging stroller. Perfect for me and my granddogs on our walks ; )
customer_reviews.author: KRS

customer_reviews.title: ***Perfect condition! Perfect buy an excellent price!!!**
customer_reviews.text: I love this product came as stated, perfect size..big enough to fit both large cats an still have enough room for more!!!! Excellent price ! Fast shipping an will buy again!!! Escape proof an even has a rain cover !!!! Luv it
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: great stroller for this price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 17 year old pup, it's held up great for over 6 months walking on some "not so great" sidewalks. we've never taken it on anything but pavement but he loves it because he can be outdoors when I go on long walks. It was easy to assemble and easy to fold up an put away - the inside lining comes out easily to wash as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. The stroller came earlier than expected. It was very easy to put together. I love the two cup holders and the little compartment for my keys/cell phone. My 13lb. Pekingese looked to be very comfortable. She could turn around with no problem and enjoyed looking out the front and rear screen. I love the fact that it came with a rain cover. It also folds nicely for transportation and storage. There is a roomy undercarriage storage compartment for whatever you need to bring. Now my dog that has breathing issues can enjoy a nice long walk with her Mommy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our Baby Girl loves her stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I have no regrets about ordering this stroller our 6 lb Pomeranian just loves it. Now we can go for long walks and she isn't being carried. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luvdogs

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: OMG..... this is the cutest thing ever! I have two shih Tzu one is a puppy 5 months old and my other one is 11 years old.. They love it!! I bought it for our RV so when we walk to areas that are far I put them in it... Talk about heaven on wheels... Made well!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Boysen

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This item is absolutely amazing and even better in person. I ordered this on Monday and needed by Friday so I contacted the seller and let them know, they told me they would get it to me as quick as possible. The stroller came in Wednesday. I was very happy this item has a zipper in the back and one in the front, it has a pet bed inside the stroller that comes out and you can was it. I would recommend this item to anyone. I haven't found one bad thing about it and it is made very well! !
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Your chariot awaits
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this cart, especially my old lady. She thinks it is her own personal chariot. She will lay there and bark at passerby like the queen that she is. This is very cute, we get a lot of compliments. The only issue that I have is that it's a bit hard to steer. For some reason the front wheel often gets locked up. It is still very useable and makes it two miles daily with little issue.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great saving
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Room for both my 18 Ib dogs if needed. Caught in rain storm, rain cover got them home safe warm &dry. We are able to take longer walks. One of my dogs has a unstable knee. I can walk him & give him a break on the stroller. He is getting stronger.great buy. Saved $$$.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: SUPER VALUE.
customer_reviews.text: SUPER VALUE ......QUALITY GALORE....CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH FOR THIS PRODUCT. BETTER THAN PRODUCTS USUALLY PRICED 3 TO 4 TIMES AMOUNT. SO CUTE AND SO FUNCTIONABLE. GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Yorkies and on the first outing the top cover came apart and I had to sew it back together. It states that it is all terrain and it almost collapsed several times on the side walk. When I tried lifting it a little, the handle came apart. It has not been user friendly nor do I recommend this product. I'm extremely disappointed. I did not return the stroller because I really need it for my dogs are service animals and I travel with them frequently. I plan on purchasing another stroller through a different source and manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They both fit in there and loved it. They feel comfortable inside of it also
customer_reviews.text: Ok the dogs are my girlfriends. 2 small ones. 1 is 11 lbs and the other is 4.5 lbs. They both fit in there and loved it. They feel comfortable inside of it also. Definately better than walking them on the leashes and we're able to take them into areas of Yellowstone where dogs were not allowed because they were in the stroller not on the leash.
customer_reviews.author: Hammerjustice01

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Taken with us around the state rugged enough to be put through some obstacles we’ve faced. Two small dogs can fit under 11 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the best animal stroller on line anywhere!!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is AWESOME!!! Well made. Cup holders are awesome. It was a lot more put together than you think it will be. Very little assembly, but some. Large enough for 2 cats or 2 small dogs. Padded on the inside and a large rain cover. Folds fairly flat. Super good looking! I feel like a very stylish crazy cat lady when I am taking my babies out for a walk. One note. It is not big enough for the cat who extends all 4's with claws out while trying to lower her into it.
customer_reviews.author: MommaG

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller I got!! For great price!! My puppy enjoyed it and now my other puppy enjoys!
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stroller and I love the YELLOW color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stroller and I love the YELLOW color! Excellent customer service as well. Consider this for your pet as a fun outing/field trip!
customer_reviews.author: Lilybee

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our two fur babies
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our two fur babies. One is 12lbs and the other is 14 and there is plenty of room for both of them. We take them everywhere with us. We have had this stroller for about 3 years now and I have not had any problems with anything. We oil the wheels periodically which I think has helped with the longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller!!!! The only thing is that I wish it would fold up flatter, and that the drink holders were larger, other than that, it's perfect!!! It rolls very easy and is easily pushed and steered with one hand!! Love!!! A++++ Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rhoden

customer_reviews.title: Jury is out.
customer_reviews.text: Having had 2 previous dog strollers I know how good they CAN be. This is a very lightweight stroller that says do NOT use on uneven ground,or store in areas exposed to high heat or low temperature or humidity for a long time. It will probably be fine for me and my dog because I will be using it mostly to take him into places that ordinarily I would not take a dog like hardware stores and outdoor cafes. I was impressed that it had 5 stars and I know that you get what you pay for. Terrible instructions also.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Rhine

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stroller. I got it for my Welsh corgi that has hip dysplasia and can't walk for very long. Now all I have to do is put her in and continue with my walk. My dog is 30 lbs and fits quite comfortable in it. It's easy to push and turns very easily.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisLuk

customer_reviews.title: It definitely is built like a doll stroller
customer_reviews.text: The stroller weels are cheap an this stroller shouldve for doll babies.It definitely is built like a doll stroller .flemsy .
customer_reviews.author: Indiajo

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this every time I take my dog out in this. My only complaint is that I can't use it all the time! And that's only because I don't want to put my dog in there when it gets too hot out. I bought this quite a while ago and it's been so useful. She had a back surgery and I've used this to take her on 'walks' so she can get fresh air. If you're questioning buying it, just go for it! You'll love it and you'll laugh whenever someone thinks there's an actual baby inside this cute little stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Pure junk. A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Pure junk. Two weeks after I got it. I took it out and took my baby for a ride , not even half a mile from my house the stick that holds the front wheel bended and almost drop my dog on the ground. Amazon should not be selling cheap that breaks . Could not send it back , cause can't find where I put the paper work to send it back. Waste of money.Had to mark a star so it would let me subject this junk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pet stroller
customer_reviews.text: I can put 2 of my cats inside , folds up easy, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Knight

customer_reviews.title: For our little old ladies
customer_reviews.text: Had one before and liked that one. We have two little old ladies and they ride nicely. We had a large two seaters but it was so rough getting through the door and opt for another one of these. Much better and g HT has a storage area and drinker holder for my keys. We like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Dorman

customer_reviews.title: Best Invention!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this buggy for our 13lb, 12 year old chihuahua who has arthritis. She loves to go on walks with her two "brothers" but she tires easily and then will just stop. That means "Mommy I want to get in my buggy", so in she goes. Its spacious enough for her to sit, lie down, or turn around in. It's very sturdy on rough or rocky terrain. And even has a compartment underneath big enough for "doggie" water bottles and water for my wife and I. And of course, my wife loves the print, just as much as Mimi LOVES to ride in it. This is a great product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Imlay

customer_reviews.title: Sweet lil doggie stoller!
customer_reviews.text: This doggy stroller has helped immensely. My dog has back problems and can't walk to the park (nor can I carry him that far) so this has been very helpful. Fresh air and green grass are important for a dog, so if getting there is a problem? This may be just the thing! If you're walking to the market, there's storage below for small items ... works for me!
customer_reviews.author: h. wiley

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this stroller for a year now, i am 5’9” and the handle is two short. Also I have two small shih tzu and they fight for space. Very small.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: ... thids is a really cute stroller and have the nice feature of a carrier on bottom for things
customer_reviews.text: Whie thids is a really cute stroller and have the nice feature of a carrier on bottom for things, it is really cheaply made. The compartment on the hande for storing thigs NEVER closed nor will stay closed, and the front wheel fell off immediately. The latch to hold it in broke. When I contacted the seller, they demanded pictures and the whole interrogation routine. I just asked for a new front wheel. Very annoying. If you want a stroller that will hold up, keep shopping - this is not the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: texpug

customer_reviews.title: We like to have him get out for some fresh air ...
customer_reviews.text: This carrier was bought to take our cat out when my husband and I walk at night. We like to have him get out for some fresh air as he is strictly an indoor cat. We love it and though all kinds of weather it has held up. Would recommend to everyone. It's stylish, has a tray for keys and a drink holder plus a bottom level for a blanket or coats etc. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: CJR

customer_reviews.title: Just Nice
customer_reviews.text: Unique and Very Contemporary, Does what it's supposed to do with some elegance. Friends loved it bought extra for gift
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Want to make friends in a new city? Walk your CAT!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows dog owners gather, admire, and eventually make a friend. Well, now the people that cats own can get in on the fun. I've never had so much attention as when I took my handsome, black, tuxedo cat, Pais, out in his leopard stroller. At first passers-by thought they were going to see a baby. No such luck. But they were fascinated by the stroller, a slick, animal print I'm proud to wheel around my senior housing complex. The unit is easy to manage, a bit of catnip aids the cat till he takes posession. He has now taken to jumping up in his stroller for various naps. Pais and I couldn't be happier. B.A.D-Cruickshank
customer_reviews.author: B. A. DuQuin-Cruickshank

customer_reviews.title: Broken front wheels!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller but like many people on here the front wheels broke off. I can’t use it anymore! I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My puppy needs this bcs she cuts up bad in public lol but I love it
customer_reviews.author: Tootie Milian

customer_reviews.title: The reality is j have dogs from a flea market bred for money and one of my girls has bad hips, she cries in pain if I walk ...
customer_reviews.text: I've turned into the dog lady walking little dogs in a stroller. The reality is j have dogs from a flea market bred for money and one of my girls has bad hips ,she cries in pain if I walk her too much but cries if we don't go out! My leopard stroller does the trick so those I see at the dog park.....laugh if u like buy my girls are hsppy
customer_reviews.author: daisybengal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stroller for small calm pets
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stroller for small calm pets. Plastic wheels, easy setup. I bought this for my 2 adult cats, it's snug but they don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Evon

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my mom she really loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is durable and has lots of nice features - removable washable pet pad on the interior, pockets, cup holder, removable weather covers, etc. My dog is a 20 lb Scottie and he fits very easily in it.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Schultz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STROLLER FOR SMALL DOGS/YORKIE
customer_reviews.text: We have a 6.5 lb yorkie and use this stroller when we go hiking on our greenway path. It's easy to push, easy to load in the car, plus the basked below allows me to take along water for her. If a big dog is coming in our path or she is simply tired I put her in the stroller. Have not had to use the plastic rain guard that fits around the front but everything else is as described and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Howland

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and plenty of room for two small dogs weighing up to 9 lbs each. I purchased a leash for two dogs and attached on the stroller to secure two dogs. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Stroller😊
customer_reviews.text: Omg the best Leapord Pet Stroller ever!🤗I love it"I mean my lil ones loved it very much🐶🐶. It was super easy to assemble in minutes. Perfect for my two pupz❤️Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Corona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for small dog who likes to carry many things
customer_reviews.author: Geli_zh

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a no brainer, even for me. Already used it to take our old doggie for a walk - and the 15 year old shiatsu enjoyed it too. Wonderful - we'll use it a lot! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John Stone

customer_reviews.title: Loved it ! But wheel fell off
customer_reviews.text: Great Stroller ! Loved it was nice and wide but front wheel fell off.. Had 2 chihuahuas in there
customer_reviews.author: Adrika

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats love this for our walk in the city. Sturdy and lots of room for 2
customer_reviews.author: Davesbabe

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is cute as can be. It is not made with top quality materials and the wheels are hollow plastic, but I only paid $50 for it! It is worth what I paid and was easy to assemble. Only took me 15 minutes and that was because I put the front wheels on upside down at first. The instructions are not the best but you don't have to be a rocket scientist to figure it out. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: fzkxx6

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: this carraige is the bomb...dont listen to the other reviews about whells coming off...my boyfriend put it together and made sure the pins were placed on the wheels..it was easy and fast. It collapses soit can easily fit in the dcar and it is sturdy and fantastic and pricede great. one of my best purchases, my dog loves it!!! get it now!!!!
customer_reviews.author: WENDY EISENSTEIN

customer_reviews.title: She and her puppy love it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for a friend. She and her puppy love it.
customer_reviews.author: sweetay81

customer_reviews.title: after hours and two days of contemplating all carriages I am SUPER happy about purchasing this one-
customer_reviews.text: Wow, after hours and two days of contemplating all carriages I am SUPER happy about purchasing this one-! Put it together in about five minutes, looks great-! Rolls just fine-! Have not used yet but sure will be fine. I love it-!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and nice looking too!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 14 lb chihuahua who loves riding in this cart, Easy to assemble, fold, and maneuver. Steering is true and tray under is a plus. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Posted as an extra wide which is what I wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: Posted as an extra wide which is what I wanted for my two dogs and it was the same size as a stroller that would only fit one dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Beach

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of openings for your dog to look out
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up for storage and easy to get ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerLoretta Susan DuBois

customer_reviews.title: My Pomeranian Nemo LOVES his new ride...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Easy to assemble. Fast delivery! Wonderful value. My friend bought the same one after she seen mine!
customer_reviews.author: sandra m perreault

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! It was easy to assemble, the color is true to the picture, its made very and all 3 of my little fur babies (13, 9, & 3 lbs) are comfy in it. The ONLY drawback is the front wheel doesnt freely move. I haven't tried to adjust it, nor do I know if I can, nonetheless, I've gotten so many compliments, (as I can take them everywhere with me now), and I have, and will continue to recommend this stroller everywhere I go!
customer_reviews.author: leigh nelson

customer_reviews.title: Tipsy
customer_reviews.text: My Dog loves her Stroller since I got it I have to take her up and down the driveway...she's an American Eskimo standard, I can't close it she's too tall I have to leave it open and if I don't hang onto the handle it starts to tip backwards..
customer_reviews.author: Journey

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase and seller prompt
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this product ! It is perfect for my 12 lb Chihuahua and extra storage .This one is xtra wide! Great purchase for the money I would like to see the wheels be a little more durable but for 50$ not bad. Similar ones at the pet store were 100 plus dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my cats wanted nothing to do with it
customer_reviews.text: Nice stroller but whenever I would get it out the cats would hide--did not like it so I donated it to our local animal shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our Yorkie has greatly appreciated this new found freedom in joining us on all of our shopping trips. He really enjoys every minute. Our dog is 11 lbs. and has great room to stretch out, relax, and cruise around. This product is well worth the money and it is all that we need in a pet stroller. The quality is better than we had first anticipated by just looking at the photos and we should not have waited as long as we did to purchase this. The navy color that we chose was accurate in its description and the ride is smooth over ruff surfaces. We will certainly recommend this product to all of our friends. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: torika

customer_reviews.title: Best cat toy we ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best cat toy we ever bought! Our cat loves to ride in this stroller, and can now enjoy the outdoors without fear. We even go out in the rain with the included plastic cover used as a Rain cover. He even sleeps in it when not strolling the neighborhood
customer_reviews.author: Kristine G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter-in-law. It was larger than expected. She likes it and enjoys using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Kane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is perfect and it took me 5 min to put together without directions, I just didn't see them at first but super easy! It's put together except wheels and they snap into place. I have two yorkies 5lbs & 6lbs and they fit it it great together.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnylove67

product_meta.title: All Terrain Extra Wide 3 Wheels Pet Dog Cat Stroller w/RainCover
feature_bullets: ☼【MADE OF DURABLE MATERIALS】Durable mesh of our dog stroller provides airflow, visibility, and keeps insects out; Oxford cloth of our pet stroller is tough and water-resistant. Large 6.3” wheels of our cat stroller glide easily over smooth or rough terrain. The front wheels can be rotated 360° without dead ends, and you can turn on the straight walk to achieve a full-featured mobile lifestyle. Pet stroller cat stroller dog stroller

☼【GREAT FOR TRAVEL】Our cat stroller no tools required. Once you’re done, the pet stroller quickly collapses for convenient storage. our dog stroller collapsible design makes it ideal for travel and camping. Pet stroller cat stroller dog stroller

☼【HUMANIZED DESIGN】Our pet stroller have a convenient cup holder near the handle. Our dog stroller roomy design with large undercarriage. The cat stroller also have hooded Peak Top Window. Pet stroller cat stroller dog stroller

☼【EASY TO ASSEMBLE & FLOD】The pet stroller easy to setup in few minutes with the install manual. Our dog stroller simple Fold for Easy Handling & Storage on a Daily Use. The weights of our cat stroller only 11lbs, It’s very easy to take your little friend for a joy ride. Pet stroller cat stroller dog stroller

☼【12 MONTHS WARRANTY & 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE】We guarantee you’ll love this pet stroller. But if you’re not satisfied with the dog stroller, please get in touch with us. We will gladly give you a 100% refund for the cat stroller. No questions asked! Pet stroller cat stroller dog stroller
